85  
    private static void initLogger() {
86  
        Logger logger = (Logger) LoggerFactory.getLogger("com.taobao.igraph");
87  
    }
 
89  
    public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException {
90  
        if (args.length != 3) {
91  
            System.out.println("USAGE: case_id server_address result_file");
92  
            return;
93  
        }
94  
        initLogger();
95  
        int case_id = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
96  
        String server_address = args[1];
97  
        String result_file = args[2];
 
99  
        System.out.println(case_id);
100  
        System.out.println(server_address);
101  
        System.out.println(result_file);
 
103  
        CaseRunner runner = new CaseRunner();
104  
        List<Case> cases = ClientCaseRunner.MakeCases();
105  
        runner.BuildCases(cases);
 
107  
        FileOutputStream fos = null;
108  
        try {
109  
            fos = new FileOutputStream(result_file);
110  
            int code = runner.RunCase(case_id, server_address, fos);
111  
        } finally {
112  
            if (fos != null) {
113  
                fos.close();
114  
            }
115  
        }
 
117  
        System.exit(0);
118  
        return;
119  
    }
120
